description: LLDP System statistics data. LLDP-MIB (lldpLocalSystemData, lldpRemoteSystemData)
title: LldpSystemStats

uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

chassis_id_subtype.description: The type of encoding used to identify the chassis associated with the system. LLDP-MIB (lldpLocChassisIdSubtype, lldpRemChassisIdSubtype)

chassis_id.description: The string value used to identify the chassis component associated with the system. LLDP-MIB (lldpLocChassisId, lldpRemChassisId)

system_name.description: The string value used to identify the system name of the system. LLDP-MIB (lldpLocSysName, lldpRemSysName)

system_description.description: The string value used to identify the system description of the system. LLDP-MIB (lldpLocSysDesc, lldpRemSysDesc)

supported_system_capability.description: The list of system capabilities supported on the system. LLDP-MIB (lldpLocSysCapSupported, lldpRemSysCapSupported)

enabled_system_capability.description: The list of system capabilities enabled on the system. LLDP-MIB (lldpLocSysCapEnabled, lldpRemSysCapEnabled)

local_port_number.description: The index value used to identify the port component. LLDP-MIB (lldpLocPortNum, lldpRemLocalPortNum)

port.description: The list of port information associated with the system known to the agent. LLDP-MIB (lldpLocPortTable)

management_address.description: The list of management address information on the system known to the agent. LLDP-MIB (lldpLocManAddrTable, lldpRemManAddrTable)

remote_time_mark.description: A TimeFilter for this entry. See the TimeFilter textual convention in IETF RFC 4502  (REMOTE only). LLDP-MIB (lldpRemTimeMark)

remote_index.description: An arbitrary local integer value used by the agent to identify a particular connection instance (REMOTE only). LLDP-MIB (lldpRemIndex)

remote_port_vlan_id_tlv.description: The integer value used to identify the port's VLAN identifier associated with the remote system on the remote port.

med_network_policy.description: Voice Vlan ID,Voice Traffic Priority and Voice Vlan DSCP value

mac_address.description: MAC address of the LLDP client.
